introduction: A filmmaker is about to shoot a documentary on the urban miracle of the city of Pontevedra. In the middle of the shoot, he realizes that he hardly knows the city and that the subject does not interest him much. He then enters a creative crisis.In the midst of this crisis, he realizes that what he is interested in is fiction and creating a fictional movie.Although he is unsure about the whole idea, he calls his usual actresses and involves them in the project. They soon realize that the project is going nowhere and rebel against the director's direction.As a result of this rebellion, they end up filming something else, which is finally Pontevedra hora cero.
